QuestData.Title: Fallen Necropolis
QuestData.Description: The fallen necropolis to the west can only be assumed to still be filled with Scourge.$B$BWhile you are at Talramas, $c, I would ask that you dispatch all of the Lich King's servants that you find within and in the surrounding pools where it fell.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 20 Scourge of any type at Talramas and the Festering Pools. Then, return to Sage Highmesa just to the south of The Dens of the Dying.
QuestData.CompletionText: Surely you could not have dispatched so many Scourge in such a short time?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n.$B$BThe Lich King and his Scourge are a blight upon Northrend. We must not stop until they are all truly dead, and his existence is put to an end!
